page.title: 15MENS EMPLOYMENT IN GOREFIELD
page.content: From a random survey of 8 men in Gorefield,5 were{employed,}2 were {self-employed}and one was{retired.}Of the 5 employees, one works in the village on a farm.His hours are from 0715 until 1600;he only has to walk a few metres to his job and he's been at the same farm for 9 years.Of the other 4 men, 2 work in Wisbech, one is at Peterborough and one travels to King's Lynn.Their occupations are a service manager,an engineer,a sailing instructor and a director of an electrical company.The 2 self-employed men are both involved in horticulture; both have been in business on their own for several years and both rely on casual labour.
